QuestData.Title: Sternfathom's Champion
QuestData.Description:
Since you defeated Ooker Dooker, there's a pit fighter spot open on Sternfathom's team. You should go establish yourself as his champion. That way, the giants won't think twice about why a stranger is suddenly coming and going as $g he:she; pleases.
Meanwhile, I'll start to sow some chaos so that we can strike at Prince Oceanus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Sternfathom as his new pitfighter.
QuestData.RewardText:
Hello, what can I do for you, little $r?
Ahahaha... it's you! I like how you came in and immediately confronted Whalebelly. That little tuskarr's got it coming.
I can tell you're going to win big for me in the arena.
